description: This lighter take on ramen, with snap peas and shaved asparagus, comes from the vegetarian cookbook author Lukas Volger The flavors are perked up with pounded or grated ginger and lemon zest You can skip the frizzled scallion garnish, but it does add nice texture to the finished bowl.
title: Spring Ramen Bowl With Snap Peas and Asparagus
title_page: Spring Ramen Bowl With Snap Peas and Asparagus Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
This lighter take on ramen, with snap peas and shaved asparagus, comes from the vegetarian cookbook author Lukas Volger. The flavors are perked up with pounded or grated ginger and lemon zest. You can skip the frizzled scallion garnish, but it does add nice texture to the finished bowl.
Featured in: Vegetarian Bowls Spiked With Vibrant Asian Flavors.
Learn: How to Cook Asparagus
